POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gaap.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: CreateProxy
<common request parameters>

{
    "AccessRegion": "SouthChina",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "Concurrent": "2",
    "Bandwidth": "10",
    "ProxyName": "test",
    "GroupId": "lg-xxxx"
}

CreateProxy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gaap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateProxy
<common request parameters>

{
    "Http3Supported": "0",
    "BillingType": "0",
    "AccessRegion": "Shanghai",
    "Concurrent": "2",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "RealServerRegion": "Guangzho",
    "ProxyName": "test",
    "Bandwidth": "10",
    "PackageType": "Thunder",
    "NetworkType": "normal",
    "IPAddressVersion": "IPv4"
}

CreateProxyGroup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gaap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateProxyGroup
<common request parameters>

{
    "Http3Supported": "0",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "RealServerRegion": "Shanghai",
    "GroupName": "benny-test",
    "PackageType": "Thunder",
    "IPAddressVersion": "IPv4",
    "AccessRegionSet": [
        {
            "NetworkType": "normal",
            "Bandwidth": "10",
            "AccessRegion": "Guangzho",
            "Concurrent": "2"
        }
    ]
}
CreateProxyGroup.title: CreateProxyGroup

CreateProxyGroupDomain.title: Enabling a Connection Group Domain Name

CreateRule.document: This example shows you how to create an HTTP/HTTPS listener forwarding rule.
CreateRule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gaap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRule
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Domain": "www.bbb.com",
    "RealServerType": "IP",
    "HealthCheck": "1",
    "ListenerId": "listener-9jt0rtv9",
    "CheckParams": {
        "ConnectTimeout": "4",
        "Path": "%2F",
        "Method": "HEAD",
        "DelayLoop": "39",
        "StatusCode": [
            "300",
            "100",
            "400",
            "200",
            "500"
        ]
    },
    "Scheduler": "rr",
    "Path": "%2Fimage"
}
CreateRule.title: Creating a listener forwarding rule

POST / HTTP/1.1

}

ModifyRuleAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gaap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyRuleAttribute
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RuleId": "rule-5g8dh58",
    "HealthCheck": "0",
    "ListenerId": "listener-8fueuc9",
    "CheckParams": {
        "Domain": "string",
        "ConnectTimeout": "12",
        "Path": "str",
        "Method": "string",
        "DelayLoop": "1",
        "StatusCode": [
            "1"
        ]
    },
    "Scheduler": "rr",
    "Path": "/"
}
